meanings.definition: The state or quality of being fetid.
meanings.sent1: The fetidities of the garbage dump filled the air with a terrible smell.
meanings.sent2: The fetidities emanating from the sewer were unbearable.
meanings.sent3: Despite the fetidities of the old cheese, the mice couldn't resist nibbling on it.
meanings.sent4: The fetidities of corruption in the government were becoming more apparent.
meanings.sent5: The fetidities of decay lingered in the abandoned house.

meanings.definition: The fetid or foul smell of something.
meanings.sent1: The fetidities of the swamp made it a challenging place to explore.
meanings.sent2: The fetidities of rotten eggs filled the kitchen after the power outage.
meanings.sent3: The fetidities of the gym socks could be detected from across the room.
meanings.sent4: The fetidities of the dumpster behind the restaurant were overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The fetidities of the skunk spray lingered in the air for hours.
